```{r}
install.packages("visNetwork", dependencies=TRUE)
library(visNetwork)
#library(tcltk)
setwd("~/Desktop")
getwd()

edges <- read.csv("popmusik_el.csv", header=T, as.is=T, sep=",")

nodes <- read.csv("popmusik_nl.csv", header=T, as.is=T, sep=",")

pop <- graph_from_data_frame(d=edges, vertices=nodes, directed=TRUE)

visIgraph(pop, type = "full", layout="layout_nicely")
pop
plot(pop, vertex.size=1.5, layout=layout_nicely, edge.arrow.size=.3)

#Subgraphen
test <- subgraph.edges(pop, E(pop)[type != "1"])

#Node-Attribute herausstellen und Isolates löschen
popsub <- delete_vertices(pop, V(pop)[genre != "1" & genre != "6" ]) #subplots, alle xy löschen
Isolated = which(degree(popsub)==0)
G2 = delete.vertices(popsub, Isolated)

outdegree <- delete_vertices(pop, V(pop)[degree(pop, mode="out") == 2]) #subplots, alle xy löschen
Isolated = which(degree(outdegree)==0)
G2 = delete.vertices(outdegree, Isolated)
plot(G2)

#Ego-Graph für Einzelpersonen
ego1 <- make_ego_graph(pop, order=3, c("Atemlos durch die Nacht"))
plot(ego1[[1]], edge.arrow.size=.1)

#Plot-Befehl für "schönen" Graphen
plot(ego1[[1]], vertex.size=20, layout=layout_nicely, edge.arrow.size=.1, vertex.label.dist=.5, vertex.label.cex=.5, vertex.label.degree=pi/2)

durchmesser <- layout.fruchterman.reingold(pop, niter = 500)
durchmesser <- norm_coords(durchmesser, ymin=-1, ymax=1, xmin=-1, xmax=1)

plot(ego1[[1]], vertex.size=2, layout=durchmesser*1.35, edge.arrow.size=.1, vertex.label.dist=.5, vertex.label.cex=.5, vertex.label.degree=pi/2)

plot(popsub)

#plot(pop, layout=layout_with_gem)
#pop

E(pop)$color <- as.factor(edges$type)

#Einfärben
V(pop)[(V(pop)$type=="2")]$shape <- "square"
V(pop)[(V(pop)$type=="1")]$shape <- "circle"

V(pop)[(V(pop)$type=="2")]$color <- "blue"
V(pop)[(V(pop)$type=="1")]$color <- "red"

#V(pop)[(V(pop)$sex=="1")]$color <- "pink"
#V(pop)[(V(pop)$sex=="2")]$color <- "blue"
```
